methods.name: b
javadoc: Generates particle effects appropriate to the phase (or sometimes sounds).
Called by dragon's onLivingUpdate. Only used when worldObj.isRemote.

methods.name: c
javadoc: Gives the phase a chance to update its status.
Called by dragon's onLivingUpdate. Only used when !worldObj.isRemote.

methods.name: d
javadoc: Called when this phase is set to active

methods.name: f
javadoc: Returns the maximum amount dragon may rise or fall during this phase

methods.name: g
javadoc: Returns the location the dragon is flying toward
